overview:
Omon Edeki currently serves as Managing Director of Nowell Development, Inc a cloud saas security software company.

Edeki Co-founded Nowell in 2003 and is the architect of the companyâ€™s artificial intelligence and anomaly detection risk security software algorithms. Edeki is well experienced in software engineering, business development, risk management and information security. Mr. Edeki, who holds a US patent in computer security, studied Computer Sciences at the University of Texas at Austin. Omon Edeki attributes all his success and enterprise to his faith in the Lord Jesus Christ
